name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove from Feed Button for YouTube

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily remove items from your YouTube subscription feed with a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Puts "X" button to the right of each videos in your YouTube subscription feed to allow removing videos with a single click.

Please report issues at https://goo.gl/4IgEU1

GitHub: https://goo.gl/2NK3T
